role_description: An Ansible role that installs LSD (LSDeluxe, a better alternative to the ls command) on nearly any playform
role_description_full_overview: [LSD](https://github.com/Peltoche/lsd) (LSDeluxe), a clone of ls, is the next gen ls command with colorful output, file type icons, and more.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs LSD (LSDeluxe, a better alternative to the ls command) on nearly any playform.
